11: Strategy and audits
Audit the main website for major technical SEO issues and rank them by impact on organic traffic.
Create a 6-month SEO strategy for a niche service website targeting leads in a specific country.
Suggest a launch SEO plan for a brand-new domain in a competitive niche with zero authority.
Outline a simple SEO framework for a solo freelancer managing several client sites per month.
Review a list of key pages and map them to funnel stages with suggested SEO actions.
Design an SEO strategy for a local service business site to dominate Google Maps and organic results.
Turn high-level business goals into concrete SEO KPIs with realistic timelines.
Recommend how to split focus between SEO for leads vs. SEO for brand awareness for a B2B SaaS site.
Create a monthly SEO maintenance checklist for a 200-page content website.
Propose an improved site structure to strengthen topical authority and internal linking on the domain.

Generate 50 long-tail keywords about a chosen topic targeting buyers in one country.
Classify a keyword list by search intent and funnel stage for better content planning.
Cluster a keyword list into topic groups and suggest one pillar page plus supporting articles per group.
For a main keyword, list related entities, FAQs, and subtopics to cover on a comprehensive authority page.
Suggest 30 blog post ideas for a niche site aimed at beginners in that niche.
Find informational keywords that show strong future purchase intent for a product or service.
Suggest problem-aware keywords people search before buying a specific product type.
Generate seasonal keyword ideas in a niche that spike in a particular month or season.
Create a keyword set to target both English and a second language audience in one country.
Give local-intent keyword ideas for a given service across a city or metro area.

Outline an in-depth pillar article on a topic with H2/H3 structure, FAQs, and internal link ideas.
Turn a keyword list into a 12-month editorial calendar with four posts per month.
Create a content brief that compares two products targeting commercial searchers.
Suggest subheadings and talking points for a best X in year roundup article.
Build a content brief for a BOFU buying guide for a specific product type.
Design a series of five blog posts that warm cold traffic into leads for a defined service.
Create briefs for three how-to tutorials that solve common problems in a niche.
Turn a YouTube topic list into SEO-optimized blog post briefs for the same channel.
For a keyword, suggest a unique angle that differentiates content from the current SERP.
On-page optimization
Rewrite a title and meta description for higher CTR while keeping the main keyword.
Suggest five SEO-friendly title variants for a blog post on a specific topic.
Optimize an article for one primary and two secondary keywords while maintaining natural tone.
Suggest internal link opportunities from existing articles to a new page on a related topic.
Create an SEO-optimized H1, H2s, and H3s for a service page targeting one city.
Recommend keyword placements (H1, intro, subheads, alt text) for a page targeting a defined keyword.
Improve a blog introduction so it better matches the search intent behind its main keyword.
Rewrite a product description to be more SEO-friendly without sounding spammy.
Generate descriptive alt text for images on a page about a specific topic.
Suggest schema types and important properties to add to a page to enhance SERP appearance.
Content improvement and expansion

Recommend semantic subtopics to add so a post can rank for more long-tail variants of a keyword.
Turn a short FAQ block into a richer, SEO-optimized FAQ section suitable for schema markup.
Show how to convert a thin 500-word post into a comprehensive guide without unnecessary fluff.
Identify outdated parts of an article and suggest updates relevant to 2025.
Propose ways to repurpose a strong blog into a cluster of related posts and a lead magnet.
Improve readability and SEO of a paragraph while preserving its original meaning.
Suggest internal link placements and anchor texts within an article to strengthen a topic cluster.
Spot content cannibalization risk between similar URLs and recommend consolidation or redirects.
Suggest ways to make a blog more aligned with EEAT principles for its niche.

Create an SOP for VAs using AI to produce SEO content to a fixed standard.
